document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Original name :
Acarus corbiculus Sowerby, 1806
.
• In : British Miscellany , or Coloured Figures of New , Rare or Little Known Animal
• Subjects , many not before Ascertained to be Natives of the British Isles . London, Tab. 66/14.
Counties: Dublin, Kildare, Mayo, Meath, Wexford .

• Original name :
Ameroseius delicatus Berlese, 1918
.

• In : In :
Redia
, 13: 144

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Lasioseius ( Lasioseius ) gracilis ( Halbert) (Halbert, 1923)
. Irih Records : On sprouting potatoes ( Halbert, 1923 ). Counties: Dublin .

•
Kleemannia pavida (Koch, 1839)
• Original name :
Zercon pavidus Koch, 1839
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc. 23 (15). • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Zercoseius macaulayi Hughes (O’Farrell & Butler, 1948)
,
Kleemannia plumosus (Oudemans)
(
Cusack et al ., 1975
; Hughes, 1976 ; Tuohy, 1979 ).
Irish Records : Stored foodstuffs ( O’Farrell & Butler, 1948 ); farm and commercial grain stores ( Cusack,
Counties: Antrim, Down, Meath , Tyrone.

•
Kleemannia plumigera Oudemans, 1930
• Original name :
Kleemania plumigerus Oudemans, 1930
. • In : Entomologische Berichten , 8 (175): 140. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Zercoseius gracei Hughes (O’Farrell & Butler, 1948)
,
Ameroseius plumigerus Oudemans ( Longworth, 1973 )
.
Irish Records : Stored foodstuffs ( O’Farrell & Butler, 1948 ); farm and commericial grain stores ( Cusack,
Counties: Antrim, Derry, Mayo , Tyrone.

• Original name :
Gamasus horridus Kramer, 1876
.
• In : Archiv für Naturgeschichte , 42: 74.

• Original name :
Epicriopsis mirabilis Willmann, 1956
.
• In : Československá Parasitologie , 3: 218.
Irish Records : Fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ).
Counties: Not specified.
